gastroesophageal reflux disease: Berkley and Jensen Acid Reducer Maximum Strength
alginic acid / aluminum hydroxide / magnesium trisilicate

Rare:: Abdominal or stomach pain or tenderness
general feeling of tiredness or weakness
muscle spasms of the face, neck, and back
rapid or worm-like movements of the tongue
stiffness of the arms or legs
swelling of the feet or lower legs
trembling and shaking of the hands and fingers
uncontrolled movements of the arms and legs
weakness of the arms and legs

Moderate: AccessPak for HIV PEP Expanded with Kaletra (emtricitabine / lopinavir / ritonavir / tenofovir)
